abstract: Mikkel Beckmann (born 24 October 1983) is a Danish professional footballer who plays as a winger and striker for IF Elfsborg, in Sweden, and the Danish national football team. He has amassed 7 caps for Denmark in total, and was a member of the FIFA World Cup squad in 2010.
